text: Emeka Francis Atuloma (born 1 October 1992) is a Nigerian international footballer who plays for Rivers United, as a midfielder. ==Career== He has played club football for Dolphins and Rivers United. He made his international debut for Nigeria in 2018. ==References== Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Nigerian footballers Category:Nigeria international footballers Category:Dolphins F.C. (Port Harcourt) players Category:Rivers United F.C. players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Emeka Atuloma
